ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( NOT(AND( ISBLANK(RW_Broker__c),$Label.Disable_all_validations_from_lead == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/) ), OR( NOT(ISPICKVAL( Lead_Sub_Sub_Source__c , 'Local')), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Lead_Sub_Sub_Source__c , 'OutStation')),NOT(ISPICKVAL( Lead_Sub_Sub_Source__c , 'NRI'))) , false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: IF you select channel partner then please select Lead - sub sub- source as Local, OutStation, NRI.
